channel.title: Next Gas on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Next Gas on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Alt. US-93 South - Next Gas 130 MPH
item.description: Next Gas 130 MPH on Alt. US-93 South. This sign is not correct, as the next gas is in McGill which is 107 miles.

item.title: US-93 North - Next Gas 78 Miles
item.description: Next Gas 78 Miles on US-93 north. Taken just north of the Alt. US-93/US-93 intersection. Wells is the next city with gas.
